hero.title: WELCOME TO CPD ALIANCE
hero.subtitle2: Excellence in execution across every domain.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Strategic solutions. Reliable outcomes. Lasting trust
about.description1: We are a multidisciplinary team dedicated to delivering reliable, high-quality, and innovative solutions that bring clarity and performance to every project. Our goal is to combine technical excellence with practical insight to create value that lasts.
about.visionDescription: To be the trusted integrated partner that turns multidisciplinary expertise into clear results and enduring value anchored in integrity, accountability, and measurable impact.
about.missionDescription: We unite diverse specialties to plan and deliver strategic, rigorous, and reliable solutions bringing clarity, performance, and sustained growth for our clients as one accountable team from concept to handover.
about.expertiseDescription: We have extensive experience in technical inspection, risk management, and providing independent design inspection services for construction projects. Our specialized team conducts precise tests to ensure the quality, efficiency, and reliability of products and systems using the latest performance and usability methods. We transform innovative ideas into user-friendly digital solutions that enhance performance and simplify processes. Our goal is to develop reliable and customized solutions that empower organizations to achieve their goals and exceed client expectations. We also take pride in our façade design expertise and delivering successful, high-quality engineering work, focusing on turning engineering challenges into practical solutions that enhance project efficiency and quality. Additionally, we operate in software distribution and supply through exclusive partnerships with technology providers worldwide.

companies.title: Our Companies
companies.subtitle: Delivering integrated solutions with professional rigor.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Transforming diverse capabilities into measurable success.

risk.title: Risk Assessment
risk.description: We build long-term partnerships across KSA—not one-off jobs. Client-centric reviews and inspections that de-risk delivery. Custom technical solutions (RDAPP, SHM, digital checklists) tailored to your project. Proven impact—from workflows to façade & structural assessments. We leverage the latest tech: AI-assisted review, drones, GPR, and data dashboards. Saudi & international codes, delivered with precision, speed, and clarity.

facade.title: Façade Design
facade.description: Integrated façade and steel delivery from concept to installation—IFC, shop, connection detailing, and fabrication packages by focused specialists. Verified performance and compliance: drift/deflection, anchorage, thermal bridging, and airtightness checked against SBC, ACI/AISC, EN/BS, and ASTM/AAMA under disciplined QA/QC. Digital-to-site accuracy via BIM LOD400/500, clash resolution, and laser/drone surveys for predictable schedules and faster approvals.

softwareDistribution.title: Software Distribution & Integration
softwareDistribution.description: We are your trusted exclusive software partner, delivering top-tier solutions through dealership, distribution, and direct sales. With strong partnerships and market experience, we ensure tailored software solutions across industries, combining innovation, reliability, and strategic impact.

softwareSolutions.title: Software Solutions
softwareSolutions.description: We convert strategic concepts into deployable products using modern tech and mature engineering practices. Transparent governance and fast feedback cycles ensure predictability. AI, immersive tech, and analytics drive measurable performance gains with secure, scalable delivery.

integratedEngineering.title: Integrated Engineering Delivery
integratedEngineering.description: One accountable team across Architecture, Structure, BIM, and Site Supervision ensures seamless continuity from concept to construction. Code-compliant, cost-aware design aligned with ACI, AISC, and Eurocode/SBC. Digital-first execution through coordinated BIM, 3D reviews, and clear documentation.

Partners.title: Our Partners
Partners.subtitle: Trusted partners for complex challenges and clear results.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question or need support? We’d love to hear from you.
